exercise.searchForStudents: Search for students by login or name (comma separated)
exercise.searchForTeams: Search for teams by (short) name or for students by login/name (comma separated)
exercise.created: A new Exercise is created with identifier {{ param }}
exercise.updated: An Exercise is updated with identifier {{ param }}
exercise.deleted: An Exercise is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the exercise {{ title }}? This action can NOT be undone!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the Exercise to confirm.

reset.question: Are you sure you want to reset the exercise {{ title }}? This action can NOT be undone!

import.markdownWarning: You can edit the problem statement after importing the exercise.

exercise.notStarted: You have not started this exercise yet.
exercise.usageCountHint: This number specifies how often points for this instruction will be added to the final score
exercise.DragDropInstruction: Drag & Drop instruction to feedback element
exercise.title: Title
exercise.dueDateError: Due Date must be after Release Date. Please check your selection again
exercise.assessmentDueDateError: Assessment Due Date must be after Release and Due Date. Please check your selection again
exercise.modeTooltip: The solving mode of an exercise determines whether students work alone or in teams. NOTE: This cannot be changed later on!

teamAssignmentConfig.teamSizeTooltip: Recommendation for tutors regarding the minimum and maximum number of students per team.

exercise.welcome: Welcome to Artemis! We have automatically created an account for you. Click the button Start Exercise!
exercise.personalRepositoryClone: Your personal repository has been set up. Click the button Clone repository!
exercise.personalRepositoryOnline: Your personal repository has been set up. Click the button Open code editor!
exercise.startError: Uh oh! Something went wrong... Please try again to start the exercise in a few minutes.
exercise.isFileUpload: This is a file upload exercise

presentationScoreEnabled.title: Presentation
presentationScoreEnabled.description: If the presentation score is enabled, tutors can enter points for students on the "Participations" page of the exercise.

title.pattern: The title must only consist of alphanumeric characters and '_', '-' or whitespaces!

shortName.pattern: The short name must begin with a letter and must not contain any special characters!
shortName.minlength: The short name must be at least 3 characters long!

packageName.pattern: The package name must consist of one or more valid Java identifiers separated by '.', e.g. "net.java"!

points.pattern: The points must be between 1 and 9999!

bonusPoints.pattern: The bonus points must be between 1 and 9999!

maxPenalty.pattern: The maximum penalty must be between 0 and 100 percent!
